org.jdom2.jaxb

Class JDOMStreamWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdom2.jaxb.JDOMStreamWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter

    public class JDOMStreamWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter
    An XMLStreamWriter implementation that writes XML data to a new JDOM Document. The document can be retrieved using getDocument().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JDOMStreamWriter()
      Create a JDOMStreamWriter with the default JDOMFactory for creating JDOM Content.
      JDOMStreamWriter(org.jdom2.JDOMFactory fac, boolean repairnamespace)
      Create a JDOMStreamWriter with the specified JDOMFactory for creating JDOM Content.

      • JDOMStreamWriter

        public JDOMStreamWriter()
        Create a JDOMStreamWriter with the default JDOMFactory for creating JDOM Content.

      • JDOMStreamWriter

        public JDOMStreamWriter(org.jdom2.JDOMFactory fac,
                boolean repairnamespace)
        Create a JDOMStreamWriter with the specified JDOMFactory for creating JDOM Content.
        Parameters:
        fac - The JDOMFactory to use.
        repairnamespace - If true, then repair namespace errors.

    • Method Detail

      • getDocument

        public org.jdom2.Document getDocument()
        Gets the Document that was created by this writer. Only available after writeEndDocument() has been called, and before the Writer is closed.
        Returns:
        The created Document
